---
title: "git_ssh_auth_invalid_private_key_missing.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines storage settings for a Git repository using SSH authentication. However, it contains an invalid configuration due to a missing private key, which is essential for SSH authentication.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The root configuration block that defines the storage settings for the application.

#### Internal Logic
- Specifies the storage type as "git"
- Contains a nested `git` block with repository and authentication details

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of storage to be used.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The type of storage, set to "git" in this case |

### `storage.git`
#### Description
Contains the configuration details specific to Git storage.

#### Internal Logic
- Defines the repository URL
- Includes an `authentication` block for SSH authentication details

### `storage.git.repository`
#### Description
Specifies the URL of the Git repository to be used for storage.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| repository | string | The SSH URL of the Git repository |

### `storage.git.authentication`
#### Description
Defines the authentication method and credentials for accessing the Git repository.

#### Internal Logic
- Contains an `ssh` block with user authentication details

### `storage.git.authentication.ssh`
#### Description
Specifies the SSH authentication details for Git repository access.

#### Internal Logic
- Defines the SSH user and password
- Missing the required private key for SSH authentication

### `storage.git.authentication.ssh.user`
#### Description
Specifies the username for SSH authentication.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| user | string | The username for SSH authentication |

### `storage.git.authentication.ssh.password`
#### Description
Specifies the password for SSH authentication.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| password | string | The password for SSH authentication |

## Error Handling
This configuration file is intentionally invalid due to the missing private key for SSH authentication. In a proper implementation, this would likely result in an error when attempting to connect to the Git repository using SSH.

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | N/A | Specifies the storage type as "git" |
| storage.git.repository | string | N/A | The SSH URL of the Git repository |
| storage.git.authentication.ssh.user | string | N/A | The username for SSH authentication |
| storage.git.authentication.ssh.password | string | N/A | The password for SSH authentication |

Note: The configuration is incomplete and invalid due to the missing private key for SSH authentication.
